text:
Um... You see, I wanted to say
"I'm glad" to this flower here...

Hehe...
Until yesterday, they were just buds...
Look... There are many friends here too...

These flowers here seem like they'll bloom tomorrow...
But the ones next to them are still tiny buds...

Everyone...
Has their own time to bloom...

Yeah...
Since the day we were born, probably...

I see...
The flowers are beautiful.
(...Mano seems to have a peaceful expression now...)
